table.name: rate_rules_and_terms
table.description: Contains the constraints in which a contract is valid.  One record per rule per contract.

columns.name: RATE_OFFERING_GID
columns.description: The GID for the rate offering related to the rule information.

columns.name: RULE_NUMBER
columns.description: Rules and Terms is used to store information about the rate offering. The rule number or rule/term identifies the rule being defined. For example, 'Rule 921'.

columns.name: RULE_TITLE
columns.description: Rule title provides a brief description of the rule being defined. For example, 'UNCLAIMED/ABANDONED FREIGHT'

columns.name: RULE_DESC
columns.description: Provides a place to store the description of the rule. For example, 'Freight that is undeliverable due to error or omission on the part of the shipper, consignee, or owner or for which no disposition instructions have been provided shall be considered unclaimed/abandoned.'

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
